channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ラジオ番組『ラティーノUSA』やその他のラテン系メディアを制作する非営利団体フトゥーロ・メディアが、「数ヶ月に及ぶ経済不安」を受けてレイオフを発表 (@futuromedia)
item.description:
@futuromedia:
Futuro Media, a nonprofit that produces the radio show Latino USA and other Latino-focused media, announces layoffs after “months of economic uncertainty”  —  A Message from Futuro Media [image]

item.title: メモフィフス・シーズン（旧エンデバー・コンテンツ）、「AMPTPとWGA＆SAG-AFTRAの係争が続いている」ことを理由に従業員の12％にあたる30人を削減（Peter White/Deadline
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Memo: Fifth Season, formerly Endeavor Content, cuts 30 positions, or ~12% of its workforce, blaming “the ongoing dispute between the AMPTP and WGA & SAG-AFTRA”  —  - Martin Sheen Goes Full President Bartlet In Rousing Speech At National Day Of Solidarity Rally In LA As Kerry Washington & Ron Perlman Blast Studios

item.title: 情報筋アマゾンはディズニーとESPNのストリーミング版について初期段階から交渉しており、おそらく配信を支援し、少数株を取得する可能性がある（Sahil Patel/The Information）。
item.description:
Sahil Patel / The Information:
Sources: Amazon has had early talks with Disney about working on a streaming version of ESPN, perhaps helping with distribution and taking a minority stake  —  Amazon has had early talks with Disney about working on the streaming version of ESPN it is developing, said people familiar with the matter.

item.title: YouTuberのJustine Ezarikらが理事を務める非営利のアドボカシー団体「Creators Guild of America」が、デジタルクリエイターの利益を支援するために発足（Kaya Yurieff/The Information）
item.description:
Kaya Yurieff / The Information:
The Creators Guild of America, a nonprofit advocacy group with board members including YouTuber Justine Ezarik, launches to support digital creators' interests  —  The Hollywood strike has highlighted the lack of a similar labor movement within the creator economy, but new efforts to change that are emerging.

item.title: Redditは、広告主がターゲットにできる関心カテゴリの数を66から152へと倍以上に増やし、今後数週間でトピックやテーマの追加を予定している（Nicola Agius/Search Engine Land）。
item.description:
Nicola Agius / Search Engine Land:
Reddit more than doubles the number of interest categories that advertisers can target, from 66 to 152, and plans additional topics and subjects in coming weeks  —  The number of interests available is increasing from 66 to 152, including new topics and subjects.

item.title: ニールセン2024年共和党大統領予備選のFox Newsによる最初の討論会の視聴者数は12.8M、2016年選挙戦の12回の討論会の平均視聴者数は～15M（Alex Griffing/Mediaite）
item.description:
Alex Griffing / Mediaite:
Nielsen: Fox News' first debate of the 2024 Republican presidential primary brought in 12.8M viewers; the 12 debates of the 2016 campaign averaged ~15M viewers  —  Fox News's first Republican debate of the 2024 presidential election exceeded expectations and brought in 12.8 million total viewers …

item.title: ハリウッドの業界紙は長い間、スタジオのPRツールとみなされてきたが、WGAのストライキ中の記事は、その信頼性を完全に打ち砕いた（Katharine Trendacosta/Defector）
item.description:
Katharine Trendacosta / Defector:
Hollywood trade publications have long been seen as PR tools for studios, but their stories during the WGA strike have absolutely shattered their credibility  —  If you were on the website-formally-known-as-Twitter last week, first of all, my condolences, we are in hell together, and second …

item.title: アマゾンの木曜ナイト・フットボール配信第2シーズンでは、Prime VisionのAIツールの充実、ブラックフライデーのショッピング統合の強化、HDRを計画している（David Pierce/The Verge）
item.description:
David Pierce / The Verge:
For Amazon's second season streaming Thursday Night Football, the company plans more AI tools in Prime Vision, more Black Friday shopping integrations, and HDR  —  This NFL season, if you watch a Thursday Night Football game on Amazon Prime Video, you're likely to see all sorts of new on-screen stuff.

item.title: メモバイス・メディアが破産後の経費節減のためブルックリンのオフィスを移転、バイスがニューヨークの新オフィスを見つけるまでスタッフの大半はリモートで働く（Gerry Smith/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Gerry Smith / Bloomberg:
Memo: Vice Media is moving out of its Brooklyn offices to save on costs after bankruptcy; most of the staff will work remotely until Vice finds a new NYC office  —  Vice Media, the onetime new media darling that declared bankruptcy three months ago, is moving out of its Brooklyn offices …

item.title: WGAの交渉担当者と会談したCEOたちは、ストライキの緊張を和らげるどころか、事態を悪化させ、エゴ丸出しの意思決定を明らかにした。
item.description:
Sharon Waxman / The Wrap:
Instead of calming strike tensions, CEOs who met with the WGA's negotiators riled things up, revealing ego-driven decision-making; the union responded angrily  —  Sharon Waxman … We all thought things were finally moving in the right direction.  We thought there might be a break coming.

item.title: バービー』、34日間で5億7,540万ドルを売り上げ、北米で2023年の興行収入トップに；『スーパーマリオブラザーズ・ムービー』、140日間で5億7,430万ドルを売り上げた（Pamela McClintock/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Pamela McClintock / The Hollywood Reporter:
Barbie becomes 2023's top-grossing movie in North America, grossing $575.4M in 34 days; The Super Mario Bros. Movie grossed $574.3M in 140 days in North America  —  Greta Gerwig's movie has surpassed ‘The Super Mario Bros. Movie’ in North America and will do the same at the worldwide box office by early next month.

item.title: OnlyFansの2022年11月期の売上高は前年同期比17％増の11億ドル、利益は同24％増の4億400万ドル、クリエイターは同47％増の320万人、ユーザーの消費額は56億ドルだった（Nathan McAlone/Insider）
item.description:
Nathan McAlone / Insider:
OnlyFans reports revenue up 17% YoY to $1.1B in the FY to November 30, 2022, profit up 24% YoY to $404M, creators up 47% YoY to 3.2M, and users spent $5.6B  —  - The OnlyFans business is still booming.  — OnlyFans users spent $5.6 billion on the platform in 2022, up from $4.8 billion in 2021.

item.title: 80カ国以上で取材し、支局長、海外編集長、編集長補佐を歴任したニューヨーク・タイムズ特派員のウォーレン・ホーゲ氏が82歳で死去（Robert D. McFadden/New York Times）。
item.description:
Robert D. McFadden / New York Times:
New York Times correspondent Warren Hoge, who reported from 80+ countries and served as bureau chief, foreign editor, and assistant managing editor, dies at 82  —  As a correspondent, including as a bureau chief, he wrote vividly from all corners of the globe.  He later served as foreign editor and assistant managing editor.

item.title: Xは、タッカー・カールソンとドナルド・トランプのインタビューが7400万回以上再生されたと主張しているが、この数字には、動画をスクロールして通り過ぎたユーザーや、数秒間視聴したユーザーも含まれている（Lisa Richwine/Reuters）
item.description:
Lisa Richwine / Reuters:
X claims Tucker Carlson's interview with Donald Trump drew 74M+ views, but the number includes users who scrolled past the video or watched for a few seconds  —  Former President Donald Trump, who opted out of a Republican primary debate on Fox News (FOXA.O) on Wednesday …

item.title: WBDは9月27日、CNNの米国内外の放送を24時間365日配信するCNN Maxを、オリジナル・コンテンツとともにMaxで "オープン・ベータ "開始する予定だ（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
WBD plans to launch CNN Max, a 24/7 stream pulled from CNN's US and international feeds alongside some original content, in “open beta” on September 27 on Max  —  - Netflix Added 2.6M U.S. Subscribers In July, Continuing Advertising Momentum Amid Password-Sharing Crackdown, Study Finds
